keywords: recipe, ice cream, boozy desserts, summer desserts, orange flavor
name: Aperol Spritz Ice Cream

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together mascarpone, cream cheese, fresh orange juice, aperol, honey, and orange zest until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Cover and chill the mixture for 60 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Churn in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer, then transfer to orange bowls and freeze until firm for 240 minutes. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve.
